data.text:
How to Get there

Bath (Berkeley Springs) is located at 39°37′32″N 78°13′37″W (39.625562, -78.226862), in the Appalachian Mountains. The town lies in the Eastern Panhandle of West Virginia 26 miles NW of Martinsburg, West Virginia and 36 miles W of Hagerstown, Maryland. Berkeley Springs is the county seat of Morgan County. Morgan County makes up one of the western counties in the Eastern Panhandle. Berkeley Spring’s zip code is 25411.

How Many Miles Away Is Berkeley Springs, WV

You can get to Berkeley Springs from several major metropolitan cities within 2 hours

Baltimore – 100 miles away

Washington, DC – 100 miles away

Pittsburgh – 146 miles away

Philadelphia – 165 miles away

Richmond– 179 miles away

How to Get Here

From Washington, D.C.

Take 495 to I-270 North towards Frederick, MD.

At Frederick, MD, take I-70 West towards Hagerstown, MD.

Stay on I-70 until you reach Exit 1B Hancock/Winchester exit.

If you enter Pennsylvania, turn around since you’ve gone too far.

Merge onto US Rt. 522 South toward Berkeley Springs, WV.

Continue on 522 South into downtown Berkeley Springs.

From Baltimore, MD

Take I-70 W.

Stay on I-70 until you reach Exit 1B Hancock/Winchester exit.

If you enter Pennsylvania, turn around since you’ve gone too far.

Merge onto US Rt. 522 South toward Berkeley Springs, WV.

Continue on 522 South to reach downtown Berkeley Springs.

From Winchester, VA

From Interstate 81 (Winchester, VA) take U.S. Route 522 North.

Continue on 522 South to reach downtown Berkeley Springs.

Directions from your Driving Start Point

Berkeley Springs, West Virginia is found in all online map tools like Google Maps, Bing Maps, and Yahoo Maps.

To get exact directions from your starting point, please click here to get the directions via Google Map.

How to Get There with Alternative Transportation

You can click on the following link which shows you different options via airplane, taxi, train and/or bus in order to get to Berkeley Springs from your current location. Please note, that Berkeley Springs doesn’t have any rental car available.
